Beyond Decentralized

Mission

The mission of Beyond Decentralized is to provide software that enables fair ownership of data.

The goal of Beyond Decentralized sofware projects is to to build an Internet of Databases with fair data ownership and independent software development prinicles vas the defining requirements.

Fair Data Ownership

Beyond Decentralized believes that:

  • Personal data should be owned by and be in custody of the person it belongs to
  • Group data should be owned by and be in custody of the group it belongs to
  • Community data should be owned by and be in custody of the community it belongs to

Applications should have access to personal/group/community data for the purpose of providing functionality. Applications should not take custody of the data they work with. Whenever possible data should be stored on, and Applications should execute on, the devices owned by the user.

Independent Software Development

Data should be stored in well defined schemas. Any application, no matter now big or small should be able to access data schemas for the benefit of the user.

Applications should be able to work on concert on the same data schemas and should develop synergies by together providing a better feature set than each one can individually.

Beyond Decentralized believes in writing Applications with open acess to their data schemas. Independent developers should be able to create Applications that "do one thing an do it well", without having to redefine common data schemas and requiring uses to duplicate their data.

Non-Profit

Beyond Decentralized is a US 501(c)(3) charitable organization, funded by individual donations and corporate sponsors. It provides an established framework for intellectual property and financial contributions that limits potential legal exposure for our project committers.

Organization

Beyond Decentralized is commited to maintain all of its records in the public space. In effect Beyond Decentralized is a non-profit DAO, with every decision recorded as a forum with voting outcomes.

DAO Records

Beyond Decentralized will use its own technology to keep track of its votes and deliberations. This is currently under construction and for the time being, transcripts of meetings are recorded in text form.

Transcripts

July 30th, 2022 Incorporated Beyond Decentralized in the State of Colorado.
